story:
Once upon a time, in a beautiful village nestled in the foothills of the Himalayas, there lived a kind and devout Hindu boy named Kishan. Kishan was known throughout the village for his generous heart and his love for all living beings. He spent much of his time helping his parents, tending to the family's cows, and studying the ancient Hindu scriptures.

Kishan's favorite story from the scriptures was that of Lord Krishna, the mischievous yet divine prince who was known for his enchanting flute-playing and his devotion to his loved ones. Fascinated by the stories of Krishna's mischief and miracles, Kishan dreamed of one day meeting the deity in person and seeking his guidance and protection.

One day, Kishan's parents decided to take a pilgrimage to the holy city of Mathura, where Lord Krishna had spent much of his childhood. Kishan was overjoyed at the prospect of visiting the birthplace of his beloved deity and begged his parents to let him come along. They finally agreed, and the three of them set off on their journey, armed with prayers and offerings for the divine.

The journey to Mathura was long and arduous, but Kishan's spirits remained high as he imagined meeting Lord Krishna and experiencing his divine presence. After many days of travel, they finally reached the holy city and made their way to the magnificent Krishna temple.

As Kishan entered the temple, he was struck by the awe-inspiring sight of the deity, resplendent in his divine glory. Kishan could feel the power of the divine emanating from the murti, and he was filled with a deep sense of devotion. He offered Lord Krishna fruits and flowers, feeling a deep connection with the deity.

That night, as Kishan lay down to sleep in the small room adjoining the temple, he felt a gentle presence by his side. He opened his eyes to find Lord Krishna himself seated next to him, his enchanting eyes filled with warmth and kindness.

"Kishan, my dear devotee," Lord Krishna said, "I have been watching over you and am deeply moved by your devotion and love for me. I have come to grant you a boon. What is your heart's deepest desire?"

Kishan was overjoyed at this unexpected opportunity, and without hesitation, he expressed his wish. "Lord, my deepest desire is to spread your message of love and devotion throughout the world and to help others experience the same connection with you that I feel. But I am just a simple Hindu boy, and I do not know how to reach so many people."

Lord Krishna smiled and placed his hand on Kishan's head, granting him the boon. "Kishan, your devotion and love for me are pure and strong. With this boon, I bless you with the ability to spread my message far and wide. You will become a great teacher, and your words will inspire and uplift countless souls. Go forth, my dear devotee, and fulfill your destiny."

With the divine blessing of Lord Krishna, Kishan went on to become a renowned Hindu teacher and spread the message of love and devotion to countless people. From a simple Hindu boy to a revered spiritual master, Kishan's journey was a testament to the power of devotion and the blessings of the divine.

From that day on, Kishan never forgot the lesson he had learned from Lord Krishna - that pure devotion and love for the divine can move mountains and grant even the most unimaginable blessings. And so, Kishan lived his life spreading the message of love and devotion, inspiring and uplifting all who crossed his path.

And with this, dear son, it is time for you to close your eyes and drift off to sleep, filled with the blessings of Lord Krishna and the knowledge that love and devotion can move mountains. Goodnight, my dear one.
